summary: THE SEAT RECLINER ON THE DRIVERS SIDE BROKE.  AFTER FIXING, THE SEAT THEN SQUEAKED AND RATTLED.  DEALERSHIP SAAID I HAVE A BROKEN SEAT FRAME.  DEALERSHIP WON'T PAY FOR DAMANGES.   *AK    THIS IS THE SECOND GENERAL MOTORS VEHICLE THAT HAS A BROKEN SEAT RECLINER.  THE FIRST ONE WAS A 98 GMC JIMMY. SAME THING HAPPENED.
